item.title: Show HN: Chonky – a neural text semantic chunking goes multilingual
item.description:
I wrote what beginning writers were supposed to write then, and probably still are: short stories. " "My stories were awful. I wrote what beginning writers were supposed to write then, and probably still are: short stories.

item.title: Tsdown – The Elegant Bundler for Libraries
item.description:
Build and generate declaration files powered by Oxc and Rolldown, incredibly fast. Support Rollup, Rolldown, unplugin plugins, and some Vite plugins. Compatible with tsup's main options and features, ensuring a smooth transition.

Read more
